title: I have a pixl 3a and the speech to text does not work unless airplane mode is on. After droid 10 up
content: I have a pixl 3a and the speech to text does not work unless airplane mode is on.  This started after download 10 update.  I have to turn airplane mode on do speech to text then go back and turn airplane mode off then send text.  I have to do the same with emails.  I was On tech support with google for 1 1/2 hours.  they want me to do factory reset or wait for next update.  Very frustrating.
